summary: This mod add some perks and new shouts.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]General:
[/size][/b]
[b]Demo:[/b] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNvPztFz5do&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GNvPztFz5do&feature=youtu.be
[/url][b]Update 1: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejWTKEZ9zEU&feature=youtu.be]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejWTKEZ9zEU&feature=youtu.be[/url][/b]

- Add 19 new Perks.
- Add 4 new Shouts
- Add the ability to level up the speech ability using shouts.
- Add aditional effect to the shouts based on the perk Hagglin (Last 3 levels)

[list=1]
[*][b]Whirlwind Sprint: [/b][color=#6aa84f]Restore Stamina. (15,30,50) %[/color]

[*][b]Become Ethereal:[/b] [color=#6aa84f]Restore Stamina, Health and Magicka. (15,30,50) %[/color]

[*][b]Battle Fury:[/b] [color=#6aa84f]Restore the allie's health (15,30,50) %[/color]

[*][b]Dragon Aspect:[/b]  [color=#6aa84f]Restore Stamina, Health and Magicka. (25,50,75) %[/color]

[/list]
[size=3][b]Install (You can use NMM):

[b]Install (Manual):[/b]
[/b][/size]

[b]ShoutPerks.bsa
ShoutPerks.esp[/b]
